title: Health inspection grades and scores (NYC A/B/C, LA county)
dataVerified: Restaurant name, inspection date, violations, grade/score, health department
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake health grades (restaurants posting fake "A" grades). Domain binding verifies health department. Mandatory public posting (NYC "Grade Pending" cards, LA county numeric scores 90-100). Customer right-to-know. Prevents grade fraud. Online verification portal integration.
